ports.inPort: Change history data could be retrieved from any Source Repository (e.g. GIT or SVN Adapter plugin). It should consist at least from Class (RowId, type string) and Marker (string) collumn.
Issue Tracking System data, could be retrieved from any ITS extension, should consists at least from IssueId column.
ports.outPort: Data table with computed Number Of Issues Metric.
